content.question: The collectivization of agriculture in the Soviet Union in the 1930's had all of the following results EXCEPT

choices.label: an increase in the domestic food supply
movement of surplus rural labor to the cities
destruction of the rural middle class
an increase in the power of the Communist Party

content.answer: an increase in the domestic food supply

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
